actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to create the Disabled Eagle passport program under which disabled persons are admitted free to certain admission fee areas in national parks and national recreation areas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Creates the Disabled Eagle passport program under which disabled persons are admitted free to admission fee areas in national parks and national recreation areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965 to create the Disabled Eagle passport program under which disabled persons are admitted free to certain admission fee areas in national parks and national recreation areas, and for other purposes.
